SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と見[み]るはずだった花火[はなび]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: The fireworks I should've watched with you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]の隙間[すきま]を埋[う]めてく
SongLyrics.EngStr: fill in the gaps in the night.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 感傷[かんしょう]にひたっちまうから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Since it's flooded with sentiments,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Twitterは閉[と]じた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I closed Twitter.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 棚[たな]の上[うえ]に置[お]いたカメラも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Now I even want to distance myself

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今距離[いまきょり]を置[お]きたいくらい
SongLyrics.EngStr: from the camera I placed on the shelf

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は今日全[きょうすべ]て失[うしな]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: I lost everything today,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一日中泣[いちにちじゅうな]いていた
SongLyrics.EngStr: crying all day long.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 本当[ほんとう]の気持[きも]ちは
SongLyrics.EngStr: I still don't understand'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: やっぱりわからないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: the true feelings.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のアルバムに居[い]る僕[ぼく]を全部[ぜんぶ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wonder if you've erased all traces of me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 消[け]したんでしょう
SongLyrics.EngStr: in your photo album

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シャッターが落[お]ちるみたいに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like the shutter that goes down,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]を切[き]り取[と]って恋[こい]に落[お]ちて
SongLyrics.EngStr: we “clicked” and fell in love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心[こころ]のアルバムに全部[ぜんぶ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: All the moments softly accumulated

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そっとため込[こ]んでた
SongLyrics.EngStr: in my heart's photo album.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だからさ だからさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's why, that's why

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 仕草[しぐさ]も匂[にお]いも覚[おぼ]えている
SongLyrics.EngStr: I memorized your movements, your smell.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シャッターを切[き]る時間[じかん]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's time to release the shutter.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]に触[ふ]れていれば良[よ]かった
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wish I would've touched you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 全[すべ]ての時間[じかん]を君[きみ]だけに使[つか]えばよかった
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wish I would've spent all my time only on you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: お決[き]まりのデートコースと
SongLyrics.EngStr: The same old dates

SongLyrics.JpnStr: お決[き]まりの愛[あい]の言葉[ことば]
SongLyrics.EngStr: and the same old words of love,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 見栄[みば]えの良[い]いものばかりが
SongLyrics.EngStr: only the pleasant things

SongLyrics.JpnStr: インスタに残[のこ]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: were left on Instagram

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 棚[たな]の上[うえ]に置[お]いたカメラじゃ
SongLyrics.EngStr: There were things between you and me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 映[うつ]せないものが
SongLyrics.EngStr: that the camera I placed on the shelf

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と僕[ぼく]の間[あいだ]にあって
SongLyrics.EngStr: couldn't project,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それに気[き]づけなかった
SongLyrics.EngStr: and I didn't realize that.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]でも気持[きも]ちは
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even now, I still don't understand

SongLyrics.JpnStr: やっぱりわからないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: the feelings.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のアルバムに居[い]る僕[ぼく]は全部[ぜんぶ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wonder if I don't even need to be

SongLyrics.EngStr: in your photo album.

SongLyrics.EngStr: we “clicked” and fell in love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 壊[こわ]したくなくて無難[ぶなん]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Not wanting to destroy anything, I surely took the safe route

SongLyrics.JpnStr: きっとやり過[す]ごしてた
SongLyrics.EngStr: and let you walk away.

SongLyrics.EngStr: That's why, that's why,
